snippet.title: YUKI MRcade Mode Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
‘YUKI Space Ranger’, the brand new mixed reality mode to YUKI, is coming on October 12! Body movement and tactical mobility must be mastered to face new perils that now come in front of the player, but also up, down, behind… everywhere! Shoot and punch your way into the level! In this 360-action-packed Mixed Reality mode!

YUKI is an upbeat mix of bullet-hell and roguelike, where the player will be able to explore the spatiality of the real world due to the mixed reality. Take Yuki, your favorite toy, in your hand and save the universe from the attack of Yokaliens, evil creatures in this multidimensional universe.

Follow us everywhere ☞ https://linktr.ee/yukivrgame
